summary: Defines FastAPI endpoints that expose spendâ€‘tracking data for the Litellm proxy, including retrieval of global spend reports, activity logs, spend per team, user, model, and tag, as well as utilities for refreshing or resetting cached spend views.
business_intent: Provide administrators and developers with programmatic access to cost and usage analytics of LLM calls, enabling monitoring, auditing, and management of spend across teams, users, and models within the Litellm platform.
